# Configuration

**Associated Type**

A type that manages configuration data for an app extension.

## Declaration

```swift
associatedtype Configuration : AppExtensionConfiguration
```

## Discussion

When you create a custom app extension, Swift infers this type from your implementation of the required [doc://com.apple.extensionfoundation/documentation/ExtensionFoundation/AppExtension/configuration-swift.property] property.

## Configuring the app extension

- **configuration**: The configuration details for this app extension.

items.description: The configuration details for this app extension.
